data.actual_result: It makes a .PNG file and makes the background transparent. Text is black nothing is inserted into the textbox.
data.expected_result: The copied text is inserted into the message box and by pressing enter you sent text to you friend.
data.short_description: Copy from Office word into Discord makes the text .PNG should be just clear text.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have some text in Word. - Copy by: CRTL + C or right click and then copy - Paste by: CRTL + V or richt click and then paste
